name: Bionic Messiah
desc: When no enemy target has Fiber, Fiber will be applied to random attacked targets after characters use an attack. After targets with Fiber receive a total of 8 attacks or are defeated, the target receives Lightning DMG equal to 4500% base DMG, adjacent targets receive DMG equal to 3000% base DMG, and all allies' Max HP increases by 80%, lasting for 3 turn(s). If only 1 enemy target is attacked, then 2 attacks are considered to have been launched.
